article_text: He won’t be there, the IRS says, because he was not given enough notice of the hearing, which was scheduled a little over a week ago.

og.description: The editors of popular tech news site AllThingsD have signed a deal with NBCUniversal to launch a new news and conference business called "Revere Digital," according to a new report from Bloomberg News.
og.title: AllThingsD team to launch 'Revere Digital'

article_metadata.description: The editors of popular tech news site AllThingsD have signed a deal with NBCUniversal to launch a new news and conference business called "Revere Digital," according to a new report from Bloomberg News.

article_summary: He won’t be there, the IRS says, because he was not given enough notice of the hearing, which was scheduled a little over a week ago.
